original_text: The men who travelled with me saw the light. But they did not understand the voice that spoke to me.
korean_text: 나와 함께 있는 사람들이 빛은 보면서도 나에게 말씀하시는 이의 소리는 듣지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: The men who travelled with me saw the light
sentences.korean_translation: 나와 함께 여행한 남자들이 빛을 보았다

sentences.original_text: But they did not understand the voice
